dt: {bc}to shelter or screen by intercepting radiated light or heat
{bc}to hide partly by or as if by a {a_link|shadow}
{bc}to darken with or as if with a shadow
{bc}to better or exceed by a shade
{bc}to represent the effect of shade or shadow on
{bc}to color so that the {a_link|shades} pass gradually from one to another
{bc}to change by gradual transition or qualification
{bc}to pass by slight changes or imperceptible degrees
{bc}to undergo or exhibit minute difference or variation

shortdef: to shelter or screen by intercepting radiated light or heat
to hide partly by or as if by a shadow
